Detailed Description

Task used to send data to a list of global id Such a task is inserted in the RFO of the node that produce a data to be send over a set a nodes. The send operation is an asynchronous operation and SignalTask is inserted in the RFO at the point where it is required to wait the completion of the asynchronous operation. The access mode of _a is R and may be concurrent with other R following the task.

The data _count_clolocal, _clos_local, _count_niremote, _ni_remote does not required to be communicated because they are recomputed during the fill_localcollection on the local thread group. The size of these arrays are allocated _count entries even if less entries are used.
